content.json:
# ISO 27001 Compliance Monitoring Workbook

This workbook provides comprehensive monitoring capabilities for ISO 27001 compliance using Azure AD, Office 365, Azure Activity, and other cloud-native data sources.

**Data Sources:** Azure AD Sign-ins, Office 365, Azure Activity, DNS, Threat Intelligence, Azure Security Center

**Last Updated:** {TimeGenerated:local}

---

## Executive Summary
High-level compliance overview and key metrics

content.title: Compliance Key Performance Indicators

content.json:
## Access Controls (A.9)

Monitoring user access management and authentication controls via Azure AD

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| summarize SuccessfulSignIns = countif(ResultType == 0), FailedSignIns = countif(ResultType != 0) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| render timechart
content.title: Authentication Events Trend

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ResultType != 0
| summarize FailedAttempts = count(), UniqueIPs = dcount(IPAddress) by UserPrincipalName
| where FailedAttempts > 10
| order by FailedAttempts desc
| take 20
content.title: Top Failed Sign-in Attempts (Potential Brute Force)

content.query:
AuditLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where Category in ("RoleManagement", "UserManagement", "GroupManagement")
| summarize Count = count() by OperationName, Result, Category
| extend RiskLevel = case(
    OperationName contains "Add member to role" or OperationName contains "Add owner to application", "Critical",
    OperationName contains "Update user" or OperationName contains "Add user", "Medium",
    OperationName contains "Update application" or OperationName contains "Add application", "High",
    "Low"
)
| project OperationName, Category, Count, Result, RiskLevel
| order by Count desc
content.title: Privileged Operations in Azure AD

content.json:
## Cryptography (A.10)

Monitoring cryptographic controls via TLS usage and certificate events

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where isnotempty(AuthenticationProtocol)
| summarize Count = count() by AuthenticationProtocol, ClientAppUsed
| extend SecurityRating = case(
    AuthenticationProtocol contains "oauth" or AuthenticationProtocol contains "saml", "Secure",
    AuthenticationProtocol contains "legacy" or ClientAppUsed in ("IMAP", "POP", "SMTP"), "Insecure",
    "Medium"
)
| order by Count desc
content.title: Authentication Protocols Usage (Crypto Security Assessment)

content.json:
## Physical and Environmental Security (A.11)

Monitoring device compliance and conditional access policies

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where isnotempty(DeviceDetail)
| summarize Count = count()
    by
    tostring(DeviceDetail.operatingSystem),
    tostring(DeviceDetail.trustType),
    tostring(DeviceDetail.isCompliant)
| extend ComplianceStatus = case(
                                DeviceDetail_isCompliant == 'true',
                                "Compliant",
                                DeviceDetail_isCompliant == 'false',
                                "Non-Compliant",
                                "Unknown"
                            )
| project
    OperatingSystem = DeviceDetail_operatingSystem,
    TrustType = DeviceDetail_trustType,
    ComplianceStatus,
    Count
| order by Count desc
content.title: Device Compliance Status

content.json:
## Operations Security (A.12)

Monitoring Azure resource operations and Office 365 activities

content.query:
AzureActivity
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where CategoryValue == "Administrative"
| summarize Count = count() by OperationNameValue, ActivityStatusValue
| where Count > 5
| extend RiskLevel = case(
    OperationNameValue contains "Delete" or OperationNameValue contains "Create", "High",
    OperationNameValue contains "Update" or OperationNameValue contains "Modify", "Medium",
    "Low"
)
| order by Count desc
| take 20
content.title: Azure Administrative Operations

content.query:
OfficeActivity
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where Operation in ("FileDownloaded", "FileUploaded", "FileSyncDownloadedFull", "FileAccessed")
| summarize Count = count() by Operation, UserId
| where Count > 100  // High volume file operations
| order by Count desc
| take 20
content.title: High Volume File Operations (Data Exfiltration Risk)

content.json:
## Communications Security (A.13)

Monitoring network communications via DNS logs and external connections

content.query:
DnsEvents
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where QueryType == "A" or QueryType == "AAAA"
| where Name !endswith ".local" and Name !endswith ".corp"
| summarize RequestCount = count(), UniqueClients = dcount(ClientIP) by Name
| where RequestCount > 100
| extend SuspiciousIndicators = case(
    Name contains "bit.ly" or Name contains "tinyurl" or Name contains "t.co", "URL Shortener",
    Name matches regex @"\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+", "Direct IP Resolution",
    Name contains "torrent" or Name contains "p2p", "P2P Traffic",
    "Normal"
)
| where SuspiciousIndicators != "Normal"
| order by RequestCount desc
| take 20
content.title: Suspicious DNS Queries

content.json:
## System Acquisition, Development and Maintenance (A.14)

Monitoring application registrations and Azure resource changes

content.query:
AuditLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where Category == "ApplicationManagement"
| summarize Count = count() by OperationName, Result, tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName)
| extend RiskLevel = case(
    OperationName contains "Add application" or OperationName contains "Add service principal", "High",
    OperationName contains "Update application" or OperationName contains "Add owner", "Medium",
    "Low"
)
| project OperationName, InitiatedBy = InitiatedBy_user_userPrincipalName, Count, Result, RiskLevel
| order by Count desc
content.title: Application Management Activities

content.json:
## Supplier Relationships (A.15)

Monitoring third-party app access and external identity providers

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where HomeTenantId != ResourceTenantId or isnotempty(CrossTenantAccessType)
| summarize Count = count(), UniqueApps = dcount(AppDisplayName) by UserPrincipalName, CrossTenantAccessType, HomeTenantId, ResourceTenantId
| extend AccessType = case(
    CrossTenantAccessType == "b2bCollaboration", "B2B Guest Access",
    CrossTenantAccessType == "b2bDirectConnect", "B2B Direct Connect",
    HomeTenantId != ResourceTenantId, "Cross-Tenant Access",
    "Internal Access"
)
| where AccessType != "Internal Access"
| order by Count desc
content.title: External/Cross-Tenant Access

content.json:
## Information Security Incident Management (A.16)

Monitoring security alerts and risky user behavior

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| summarize Count = count() by AlertSeverity, bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| render columnchart
content.title: Security Alerts by Severity

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where RiskLevelDuringSignIn in ("high", "medium")
| summarize RiskySignIns = count(), UniqueUsers = dcount(UserPrincipalName) by RiskLevelDuringSignIn, bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| render columnchart
content.title: Risky Sign-in Detections

content.json:
## Information Security Aspects of Business Continuity Management (A.17)

Monitoring Azure backup operations and service health

content.query:
AzureActivity
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ResourceProvider == "Microsoft.RecoveryServices"
| summarize Count = count() by OperationNameValue, ActivityStatusValue, bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| extend Status = case(
    ActivityStatusValue == "Succeeded", "Success",
    ActivityStatusValue in ("Failed", "Cancelled"), "Failure",
    "InProgress"
)
| where Status in ("Success", "Failure")
| summarize Count = sum(Count) by Status, bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| render columnchart
content.title: Azure Backup Operations Status

content.json:
## Compliance (A.18)

Monitoring audit log integrity and policy compliance

content.query:
AuditLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where Category == "Policy" or OperationName contains "policy"
| summarize Count = count() by OperationName, Result, Category
| extend ComplianceImpact = case(
    OperationName contains "conditional access" or OperationName contains "Conditional Access", "Critical",
    OperationName contains "Update policy" or OperationName contains "Delete policy", "High",
    OperationName contains "Create policy", "Medium",
    "Low"
)
| project OperationName, Category, Count, Result, ComplianceImpact
| order by Count desc
content.title: Policy Configuration Changes (Compliance Risk Events)

content.json:
## Cloud Security Posture (Additional)

Monitoring Microsoft Defender for Cloud recommendations

content.query:
SecurityRecommendation
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| summarize Count = count() by RecommendationSeverity, RecommendationState
| extend SeverityScore = case(
    RecommendationSeverity == "High", 3,
    RecommendationSeverity == "Medium", 2,
    RecommendationSeverity == "Low", 1,
    0
)
| project RecommendationSeverity, RecommendationState, Count, SeverityScore
| order by SeverityScore desc, Count desc
content.title: Security Recommendations by Severity

content.json:
## Compliance Dashboard Summary

Overall compliance posture and trending using cloud-native data sources

content.query:
let ControlAreas = datatable(ControlArea:string, Weight:double)
[
    "Access Controls", 0.25,
    "Operations Security", 0.20,
    "Communications Security", 0.15,
    "Incident Management", 0.15,
    "System Development", 0.10,
    "Supplier Management", 0.10,
    "Compliance Monitoring", 0.05
];
let AccessScore = SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| summarize Total = count(), Failed = countif(ResultType != 0)
| extend Score = case(Total == 0, 100.0, round((1.0 - (todouble(Failed) / todouble(Total))) * 100, 2))
| project Score;
let OpsScore = AzureActivity
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where CategoryValue == "Administrative"
| summarize Total = count(), Failed = countif(ActivityStatusValue == "Failed")
| extend Score = case(Total == 0, 100.0, round((1.0 - (todouble(Failed) / todouble(Total))) * 100, 2))
| project Score;
let CommScore = DnsEvents
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| summarize Total = count(), Suspicious = countif(Name contains "bit.ly" or Name contains "tinyurl")
| extend Score = case(Total == 0, 100.0, round((1.0 - (todouble(Suspicious) / todouble(Total))) * 100, 2))
| project Score;
let IncidentScore = SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| summarize Total = count(), Critical = countif(AlertSeverity == "High")
| extend Score = case(Total == 0, 100.0, round((1.0 - (todouble(Critical) / todouble(Total))) * 100, 2))
| project Score;
let SysDevScore = AuditLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where Category == "ApplicationManagement"
| summarize Total = count(), Risky = countif(OperationName contains "Add application")
| extend Score = case(Total == 0, 100.0, round((1.0 - (todouble(Risky) / todouble(Total))) * 100, 2))
| project Score;
let SupplierScore = SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| summarize Total = count(), External = countif(HomeTenantId != ResourceTenantId)
| extend Score = case(Total == 0, 100.0, round((todouble(External) / todouble(Total)) * 50 + 50, 2))  // Normalize external access
| project Score;
let ComplianceScore = AuditLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where Category == "Policy"
| summarize Total = count(), Changes = countif(OperationName contains "Update policy" or OperationName contains "Delete policy")
| extend Score = case(Total == 0, 100.0, round((1.0 - (todouble(Changes) / todouble(Total))) * 100, 2))
| project Score;
ControlAreas
| extend ActualScore = case(
    ControlArea == "Access Controls", toscalar(AccessScore),
    ControlArea == "Operations Security", toscalar(OpsScore),
    ControlArea == "Communications Security", toscalar(CommScore),
    ControlArea == "Incident Management", toscalar(IncidentScore),
    ControlArea == "System Development", toscalar(SysDevScore),
    ControlArea == "Supplier Management", toscalar(SupplierScore),
    ControlArea == "Compliance Monitoring", toscalar(ComplianceScore),
    0.0
)
| extend WeightedScore = ActualScore * Weight
| project ControlArea, ActualScore, Weight, WeightedScore
content.title: ISO 27001 Control Areas Compliance Score (Cloud-Native Sources)
